# Core Conceptual Model: Informative

##  1. <a name='Pre-LearningWorkflow'></a>Pre-Learning Workflow
1. **LMS** loads/imports (Course) **Structure**
    1. (Course) **Structure** contains *references* to one or more **Units** organised into heirarchical **Sections**.
    * _References_ to Units, not actual Units. Sections are part of the Structure, Units aren't.
1. **Administrator** assigns appropriate Course specific **Roles** to other **Stakeholders**
    * *Example*: **Administrator** assigns **Course** to **Learner**
    * *Example*: **Learner** registers for **Course** trigerring automatic assignment.
    1. **LMS** creates personalised *instance*/*iteration* called a **Action Plan** from **Structure**
        * *Example:* **Learning Plan** for learners.
        * *Example:* **Mentoring Plan** for instructors.
        * *Example:* **Marketing Campaign** for visitors/users.
    1. **LMS** assigns **Role** based **Capabilities** to all Stakeholders (**Actors**).
        * Examples of Roles include Course Owners, Administrators, Managers, Instructors, Assessors, Observers, Auditors, Students.
        *
        * *Example:* **LMS** assigns **Learning Plan** to **Learner**
        * **Capabilities** cover possible interactions and report viewing.

##  2. <a name='InteractionWorkflow'></a>Interaction Workflow

Includes Learning, Learning Management and Instruction

* **Stakeholder** *authenticates* with **LMS**
* **Stakeholder** receives **Capabilities**
* **Stakeholder** requests interaction with **Unit** from **LMS**
* **LMS** launches **Session** with **State** Information
* **LMS** writes **State** to **LRS**
* **Unit** requests **State** information from **LMS**
* **Unit** loads (Unit) **Content**
* **Stakeholder** interacts with **Content**
* **Unit** sends and requests *information* relevant to the *interaction** to and from **LMS**
* **LMS** generates **Statements** describing **Stakeholder** interaction using *information* received from **Unit**
* **Stakeholder** exits **Unit**
* **Unit** sends final tracking data.
* **Unit** issues a **terminate** statement.
* **LMS** writes generated statements to **LRS**

##  3. <a name='ReportingWorkflow'></a>Reporting Workflow

* **LRS** retreives and presents *information* from stored **Statements** as **Reports**
* **Administrator** create and view ***Reports** from stored **Statements**
* **Stakeholders** view **Reports** based on **Capabilities**

##  4. <a name='Appendices'></a>Appendices

###  4.1. <a name='StateAPIDataStructuregeneratedbyLMSNavigatorModule'></a>State API Data Structure (generated by LMS/Navigator Module)

```js
{
    "state_id": 123, // {autoincrement from db}
    "state_activity_id": 1, // {autoincrement from db, will be used by unit as the object_id in the statements it generates},
    "agent": ,
    "registration": ,
    "launch_data": {
        "context_template": Template_Object, //json describing a schema for context
        "launch_mode": "normal" //, "browse", "review"(, "mentor"),
        "launch_parameters": Custom_Object,
        "mastery_score": 0-1,
        "move_on": "passed", //"completed", "completed_and_passed", "completed_or_passed", "not_applicable",
        "return_url": "some_url", // where the unit should redirect to on exit
        "role": {"identifier of the composite role generated for the WP_User from Role, Post, etc"},
    },
}
```

###  4.2. <a name='ActivityDataStructuregeneratedbyNavigatorUnitforObserver'></a>Activity Data Structure (generated by Navigator & Unit for Observer)

```js
{
    "activity_id":      2, // {autoincrement from db}
    "actor_id":         WP_User->ID,
    "verb":             "completed",
    "state_activity_id": 1, // {from state data},
    "object_id":        WP_Post->ID, // WP_Term->term_id, WP_Comment->comment_id, Custom_Object->identifier
    "object_type":      "post", // "term", "comment", "object",
    "object_subtype":   WP_Post->post_type, //WP_Term->taxonomy, WP_Comment->comment_type, Custom_Object->sub_type,
    "result": { // goes into meta
        "score_scaled": 0.88, // 0-1,
        "score_raw":    22, //score_min-score_max,
        "score_min":    0, //(must be provided if raw is provided)
        "score_max":    25, //(must be provided if raw is provided)
        "success":      boolean,
        "completion":   true, // or NULL, never false
        "duration":     10,
        "progress":     99, // 0-100,
        "reason":       "tested_out", // | "equivalent_unit" | "equivalent_outside_activity" | "administrative",
    },
    "context": { // goes into meta
        "registration": "",
        "context_activity": 123, // activity_id, multiple entries,
        "session_id": "2727egd7g8q9",
        "mastery_score": 0.35,
        "launch_mode": "normal", // "browse", "review", "mentor",
        "launch_url":,
        "move_on": "passed", // "completed", "completed_and_passed", "completed_or_passed", "not_applicable",
        "launch_parameters": Custom_Object,
    },
    "timestamp":  073734343738      //{timestamp}
}
```

###  4.3. <a name='CourseStructure'></a>Course Structure

```js
{
    "id",
    "title": {
        "en-US": "This is a course title",
        "es-MX": "Se trata de un título del curso",
    },
    "description": {
        "en-US": "This is a course description",
        "es-MX": "Esta es una descripción del curso",
    },
    "object_id": {
        "en-US": WP_Post->ID,
        "es-MX": WP_Post->ID,
    }
    "object_type":      "post",
    "object_subtype":   WP_Post->post_type,
    "section" : {
        "id",
        "title": {
            "en-US": "This is the section title",
            "es-MX": "Este es el título del sección"
        },
        "description": {
                "en-US": "This is the section description",
                "es-MX": "Este es la descripción del sección",
        },
        "object_type":      "term",
        "object_subtype":   WP_Term->taxonomy,
        "objective": {
            "id",
            "title": {
                "en-US": "This is the objective title",
                "es-MX": "Este es el título del objetivo",
            },
            "description": {
                "en-US": "This is the objective description",
                "es-MX": "Esta es la descripción objetiva",
            },
        }, // objective
        "unit": {
            "id",
            "launch_method": "own_window", "any_window",
            "mastery_score": 0-1,
            "move_on": "passed", "completed", "completed_and_passed", "completed_or_passed", "not_applicable",
            "title": {
                "en-US": "This is a unit title.",
                "es-MX": "Este es un título de la unidad."
            }
            "description": {
                    "en-US": "This is the unit description",
                    "es-MX": "Esta es la descripción de la unidad",
                },
            "objective": {
                "id",
                "title": {
                    "en-US": "This is the objective title",
                    "es-MX": "Este es el título del objetivo",
                },
                "description": {
                    "en-US": "This is the objective description",
                    "es-MX": "Esta es la descripción objetiva",
                },
            }, // objective
            "url":,
            "launch_parameters": Custom_Object,
            "role": {to match against launchdata},
            "object_id": {
                "en-US": WP_Post->ID,
                "es-MX": WP_Post->ID,
            }
            "object_type":      post, term, comment, object,
            "object_subtype":   WP_Post->post_type, WP_Term->taxonomy, WP_Comment->comment_type, Custom_Object->sub_type,
        } // unit
    } // section
} // course
```

###  4.4. <a name='SystemTaxonomies'></a>System Taxonomies

```js
{
  "launch_mode": [ "normal", "browse", "review", "mentor" ],
  "move_on": [ "passed", "completed", "completed_and_passed", "completed_or_passed", "not_applicable" ],
  "reason": [ "tested_out",  "equivalent_unit", "equivalent_outside_activity", "administrative" ],
  "course_types": [ "course", "post_type" ],
  "section_type": [ "llms_section", "llms_quiz", "llms_assignment", "taxonomy" ],
  "unit_types": [ "lesson", "question", "task", "editor-block", "embed" ],

}
```


###  4.5. <a name='LearnerWorkflow'></a>Learner Workflow

####  4.5.1. <a name='Pre-Learning'></a>Pre-Learning

* (**Learner** authenticates with **LMS**.)
* **Learner** requests **LMS** for assignment of **Course** (= Learner registers for Course):
    1. **LMS** assigns pre-generated **Journey** to **Learner**.
    1. **Learner** receives pre-defined **Capabilities**.

####  4.5.2. <a name='Learning'></a>Learning

* **Learner** requests launch of **Unit** from **LMS**
* **LMS** launches **State**
* **LMS** records **State** into **LRS**
* **LMS** launches **Unit** after validating authentication and capabilities
* **Unit** loads **State** from LMS
* **Unit** loads Unit **Content**
* **Learner** interacts with **Content**
* **Unit** interacts with **LMS**
* **LMS** records **Statements** into **LRS**

####  4.5.3. <a name='Reporting'></a>Reporting

* **Learner** requests **Report** from **LRS**
* **LRS** requests authentication from **LMS**
* **LRS** requests **Capabilities** from **LMS**
* **LRS** displays **Report**

###  4.6. <a name='InstructorWorkflow'></a>Instructor Workflow

####  4.6.1. <a name='Pre-Instruction'></a>Pre-Instruction

1. **Adminsitrator** assigns **Instructor** role to **User**
    1. **LMS** assigns pre-generated **Journeys** of one or more **Learner** to **Instructor**.
    1. **Instructor** receives pre-defined **Capabilities**.
1. (**Instructor** authenticates with **LMS**.)

####  4.6.2. <a name='Instruction'></a>Instruction

* **Instructor** requests launch of **Unit** from **LMS**
* **LMS** launches **State**
* **LMS** records **State** into **LRS**
* **LMS** launches **Unit** after validating authentication and capabilities
* **Unit** loads **State** from LMS
* **Unit** loads Unit **Content**
* **LMS** **Statements** for one or more **Learners**
* **Instructor** interacts with **Unit**
* **Instructor** interacts with **Statements**
* **Unit** interacts with **LMS**
* **LMS** records **Statements** into **LRS**

####  4.6.3. <a name='Reporting-1'></a>Reporting

* **Instructor** requests **Report** from **LRS**
* **LRS** requests authentication from **LMS**
* **LRS** requests **Capabilities** from **LMS**
* **LRS** displays **Report**
